alert.note: Alert for Coffee; De Kalb; Grundy; Van Buren; Warren (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 12:08AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern De Kalb, southwestern Van Buren, Warren, eastern Coffee and northern Grundy Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1208 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Manchester, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... McMinnville, Manchester, Altamont, Morrison, Beersheba Springs, Viola, Hillsboro, Rock Island State Park, Summitville and Woods Reservoir. This includes Interstate 24 between mile markers 112 and 125. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for Middle Tennessee. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for Middle Tennessee.

area.areaDesc: Coffee; De Kalb; Grundy; Van Buren; Warren
